summary: The diff does not add the required MP3 asset or update any frontend code/asset references; only project_state.json was modified. REQ-28 is therefore not implemented based on the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Download the provided MP3 and commit it as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/audio/i-wanna-be-yours.mp3 so existing code using getAssetUrl('audio/i-wanna-be-yours.mp3') can load it in production without external hotlinking.
missing_requirements.reason: No new file was added under frontend/public/assets/audio/, and the only modified file shown is project_state.json. The required MP3 asset is not present in the diff summary, so the app cannot load it as a shipped static asset.
